title: 構造体のポインタ5
question: ???に入るのはなに
source:

<color=#ffd700>}</color>;

<color=#358cd6>void</color> Print<color=#ffd700>(</color>DATA* p<color=#ffd700>)</color><color=#ffd700>{</color>
  printf<color=#ffd700>(</color><color=#ce9178>"%d  "</color>,p->num<color=#ffd700>)</color>;
<color=#ffd700>}</color>

<color=#358cd6>int</color> main<color=#ffd700>(</color><color=#ffd700>)</color>
<color=#ffd700>{</color>
